name: Cave Flowers
description:
A Very, very short game made in Ludum Dare 52.  You play as a Cube exploring a cartoony cave and harvesting flowers which give you access to a double jump and ammo for a shotgun. You maneuver around platforming levels using your shotgun for mobility

This game is unfinished, as I had to cut it short. There were quite a few planned features that I just couldn't quite squeeze in, but the game is playable and has a level timer so I suppose you could get some replay value from  speed running those levels.

I may still add some more features, but this is it for the game jam version.
